snippet: A federal judge’s ruling on the emergency contraceptive pill is a fitting rebuke to a politically motivated decision.
abstract: Editorial praises Federal Judge Edward Korman for overturning Obama administration's ban preventing girls younger than 17 from purchasing emergency contraceptive pills over the counter; holds ruling is well-deserved rebuke to politically motivated decision.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge’s ruling on the emergency contraceptive pill is a fitting rebuke to a politically motivated decision.

headline.seo: Good Sense on the Morning-After Pill
headline.main: Good Sense on the Morning-After Pill
headline.print_headline: Good Sense on the Morning-After Pill
